The source for this app is available in the Java-util, TicTacToe, and TicTacToeAndroidApp repositories on GitHub.

The TicTacToe library uses math routines from the Apache Commons Math Library, licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0, and primitive collections from the GNU Trove library, licensed under the GNU Lesser General Public License, version 2.1.
